[DQC.US.0109.9570] The concept us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskPercentage1 with value 0.1 is used with the ConcentrationRiskByBenchmarkAxis with a benchmark of us-gaap:AccountsReceivableMember. The risk associated with this benchmark of us-gaap:AccountsReceivableMember is not approproiate to this benchmark. Consider using an extension risk or one of the risks associated with this banch mark such as CreditConcentrationRiskMember, GeographicConcentrationRiskMember, CustomerConcentrationRiskMember
The properties of this us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskPercentage1 fact are:
Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-06-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskByTypeAxis=us-gaap:AccountsReceivableMember, us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskByBenchmarkAxis=us-gaap:AccountsReceivableMember Unit : pure
